entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:18 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 02:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: W 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
